Package fr.uparis.beryllium.controller

Class MapController

java.lang.Object
fr.uparis.beryllium.controller.MapController
@RestController public class MapController extends Object
Map Controller class that allows us to make HTTP requests

  • Method Details

    • getStations

      @GetMapping("/stations") public List<Station> getStations() throws FormatException
      This method allows us to send an HTTP GET request to get all stations
      Returns:
      a list of all stations
      Throws:
      FormatException

    • shortestWay

      @GetMapping("/shortest-way") public void shortestWay(@RequestParam String depart, @RequestParam String arrivee, @RequestParam Integer preference, @RequestParam String time, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws FormatException
      Doesn't recalculate the path if it's already calculated.
      Parameters:
      depart - contains 'name' and 'localisation' of our starting station
      arrivee - contains 'name' and 'localisation' of our destination station
      preference - 0: shortest distance, 1: best time, 2: closest in the tree
      time - time we want to leave
      response - HTTP response to send
      Throws:
      FormatException

    • getSchedules

      @GetMapping("/schedules") public List<String> getSchedules(@RequestParam String stationName, @RequestParam String lineName) throws FormatException
      This method allows us to send an HTTP GET request to get all schedules of a station for a line
      Parameters:
      stationName -
      lineName -
      Returns:
      a list of all schedules of a station for a line
      Throws:
      FormatException
